title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 5 Picks and Betting Breakdown
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 5 Picks and Betting Breakdown
description:
First, Fake Questions, Real Answers on what Urban Meyer should say to his team, if LSU is a better HC job than USC, and what the hell is up with Kyrie Irving (3:00).Colin's NFL Week 5 picks are in and The Action Network CCO Chad Millman tells him if he's sharp or square on Eagles/Panthers (11:00), Titans/Jaguars (13:00), Bears/Raiders (16:00), Browns/Chargers (22:00), Niners/Cardinals (25:00), Giants/Cowboys (27:00), Bills/Chiefs (31:00), and Saints/Washington (33:00). They also discuss Chad's most bettable game this week and Chad's "disgusting" bet (42:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
